alert.note: Alert for Orange; Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 7:53AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calcasieu Parish, southwestern Newton and Orange Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 752 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vidor, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange, Vidor, Bridge City, West Orange, Deweyville, Starks, Mauriceville, Rose City, Pine Forest, Pinehurst, Hartburg, Forest Heights, Toomey and Orangefield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 858. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
